title: Product Experience Feedback Survey
questions: How would you rate your overall experience with our product on a scale of 1-10?
What features do you use most frequently, and why?
What improvements or new features would you like to see in the future?
How likely are you to recommend our product to a friend or colleague?

criteria.name: Completeness
criteria.description: Did the user answer all questions with sufficient detail?

criteria.name: Quality
criteria.description: Is the feedback specific, actionable, and valuable?

criteria.name: Clarity
criteria.description: Are the responses clear, well-articulated, and easy to understand?
